Sat, 24 Aug 2013 17:58:29 +0200

This is OpenAL Soft 1.15.1, downloaded from:
http://kcat.strangesoft.net/openal-soft-1.15.1.tar.bz2
Built in Release mode using Visual C++ 2010 Express and Windows 7.1 SDK.

Note that the library is named OpenAL32 even on 64-bits.

License is LGPL, see the COPYING file.

#The OpenAL32.dll and wrap_oal.dll files are from Creative, downloaded from:
#http://connect.creativelabs.com/openal/Downloads/oalinst.zip
#These dll files were copied from C:/Windows/SysWOW64 after installation.

~rdb
